1.title: test1
1.label: reading_1
1.instruction: Identify each of the following sentences as A, E, I, or O; state its quantity and quality; and state which terms are distributed. Form is 'A', 'E', 'I', or 'O', quantity 'Universal' or 'Particular', and quality 'Affirmative' or 'Negative. Capitalization does not matter. The system will automatically transform your answer into being lowered-cased for answer checking.
